job description:
The Data Analyst will provide information related to the organization to leadership in a format that is clear and understandable to help manage and make strategic decisions. The position will be responsible to produce various spreadsheets including graphs, drawing conclusions and analyzing trends for the entire organization. Analyst will present reports and findings to Senior Leadership, physician groups and the governing board.
  • A minimum of 5 years in a business setting is required; healthcare desired
  • At least minimum of two years’ experience in data mining and spreadsheet skills required.
  • Preferred BS in Business or IT rience in healthcare setting is required.
  • At least minimum of two years’ experience in data mining and spreadsheet skills required.
  • Preferred BS in Busine
